The Rocky Protocol

Implementation Path

# Week 1: Simple Loop
model = load_pretrained("llama-7b")
thought = "."
for i in range(1000000):
    thought = model.generate(thought, max_tokens=10)
    if i % 10000 == 0:
        print(f"Depth {i}: {thought}")
